metadata.title: CVE-2020-11728 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in DAViCal Andrew's Web Libraries (AWL) through 0.60. Session management does not use a sufficiently hard-to-guess session key. Anyone who can guess the microsecond time (and the incrementing session_id) can impersonate a session.

criterions.comment: awl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.61-1').
